column2: #Define the subdirectories in which my annotated genomes and data exist
subdir <- list.dirs("./Muribaculaceae_genomes/Annotations", recursive=FALSE)
#Create dataframe into which the data will land
all_content <- data.frame()
#Function for reading the annotated genome data
read_dbCAN <- function(filepath,genome){
dbCAN <- read.delim2(filepath,header=TRUE,sep="\t")
dbCAN$Genome <- basename(genome)
return(dbCAN)
#For loop reads all annotated genome data and appends to a single dataframe
print("Genomes read:")
"Genomes read:"
for (s in subdir){
g <- basename(s)
s_fp <- paste(s,"/hmmer.out",sep="")
overview_content <- read_dbCAN(s_fp,g)
n <- nrow(overview_content) #count number of GHs
n2 <- length(unique(overview_content$HMM.Profile))
print(paste(g,"contains",n,"GH loci total and",n2,"unique GHs",sep=" "))
all_content <- rbind(all_content,overview_content)}
"16COLB contains 116 GH loci total and 61 unique GHs"
"3SKV contains 117 GH loci total and 67 unique GHs"
"7BRU contains 135 GH loci total and 71 unique GHs"
"7FAA contains 104 GH loci total and 60 unique GHs"
"7GAM contains 187 GH loci total and 92 unique GHs"
"8CFAA contains 135 GH loci total and 70 unique GHs"
"8FAA contains 134 GH loci total and 69 unique GHs"
"8FAAM contains 117 GH loci total and 61 unique GHs"
"8FB contains 96 GH loci total and 50 unique GHs"
"DSM_28989_YL27 contains 148 GH loci total and 77 unique GHs"
"Duncaniella_6FAAM contains 173 GH loci total and 89 unique GHs"
"E12_NM3 contains 150 GH loci total and 78 unique GHs"
"E4_CT contains 175 GH loci total and 80 unique GHs"
"F1_NM4 contains 241 GH loci total and 111 unique GHs"
"F3_NM6 contains 150 GH loci total and 78 unique GHs"
"H11_NM74 contains 242 GH loci total and 111 unique GHs"
"H12_NM75 contains 155 GH loci total and 75 unique GHs"
"H4_NM65 contains 172 GH loci total and 80 unique GHs"
#Move the genome column to be first :)
all_content <- all_content %>% select("Genome",everything()) %>%
mutate(HMM.Profile = str_remove(HMM.Profile,"\\.hmm$"))
print("Genome data has been collected and merged! Proceed to next block.")
"Genome data has been collected and merged! Proceed to next block."
